card.name: Surprise Attack
card.effect:
Immediately: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.
After combat: If Invisible Man is on a space with a fog token, move that fog token to another space.

card.name: Slip Away
card.effect: After combat: Move 1 fog token to a space without a fighter, then place Invisible Man on that space.

card.name: Emerge From Mist
card.effect: During combat: If Invisible Man started this turn on a space with a fog token, this card's value is 5 instead.

card.name: Snicker-Snack
card.effect: After combat: If you won the combat, look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 card for them to discard.

card.name: The Other Side of the Mushroom
card.effect: After combat: Move Alice up to 3 spaces. Change size.
